name: Diadra Empty
description: Diadra Empty is a free-roaming shoot-'em-up on a grand scale. Take the role of Nyalra and her faithful dragon Minimi in a fantastical quest to save her missing sister, and battle legions of monsters and menacing bosses.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® Vista, 7, 8 Processor: Intel® 1 GHz Processor or comparable Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 9-level Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® Vista, 7, 8 Processor: Intel® 2 GHz Processor or comparable Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 9-level Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible Sound Card

reviews.review_text: Game is awesome, but a myriad of bugs and issues prevent it for being a recommendable purchase. Avoid the Steam Release

Cons: - I thought I could live with my character always firing too fast, but I was wrong.  - Also, my Afterglow XBox controller was not compatable.  Pros: + I like the sidescrolling aspect, makes it feel completely different than Touhou. + Beautiful graphics and music!  The ONLY reason I do not recommend this game is because of the firing speed.
